channel.title: Xiaomi 15 Ultra MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater
channel.description: Your best website to track MIUI ROM releases!

image.title: Xiaomi 15 Ultra MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.102.0.VOACNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 15 Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 15 Ultra China

Codename: xuanyuan

Version: OS2.0.102.0.VOACNXM | 15.0

Size: 11.5 GB

MD5: 6a1fba45025dca63ef51f6471459ee63

Changelog:
[System]
New: Support for one-tap clipboard clearing
Optimization: Bluetooth status bar icon
Updated the security patch to January 2025. Increased system security.
[Floating windows]
New: Beautify for video feature entry prompt in the call toolbox
[Home screen]
New: After turning off the Home screen search bar, a 4×6 layout option becomes available
[Control center]
New: Flashlight brightness adjustment page
New: Certain devices now support adjustable flashlight brightness
New: Notification spotlight for flashlight
[Xiaomi HyperConnect]
New: Support for file transfers between different devices using different Xiaomi Accounts
Optimization: Animations for expanding cards in Xiaomi Smart Hub
[Gallery]
Optimization: Display layouts for Gallery items
Optimization: Gallery now supports deleting and hiding items via long pressing
Optimization: Search results for time and location keywords
[Recents]
Fix: Recents couldn't be cleared in some cases
[More features and improvements]
Optimization: Swipe right on your Lock screen when Wallpaper Carousel is on to find revamped wallpaper settings

Download: Here
